sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has vowed to continue the war with Hamas whose health ministry in Gaza say that some 22,000 people have been killed the death toll during the ongoing war in the Gaza Strip has risen to some 22,000 with over 58,000 wounded according to the Ministry of Health in Hamas run Gaza who say that two-thirds of those killed are women and children dozens of bodies of those killed due to the Israeli bombing arrived at Al-Aqsa Maser's hospital in the Palestinian city of Deir el-Bala in the central Gaza Strip, as mourners gathered in the hospital's courtyard for funeral prayers before taking the dead for burial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The search for victims of Israeli airstrikes continued at the Al-Megazi refugee camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Palestinian civil defence said that ambulances were unable to reach the targeted areas due to heavy bombardment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vowed to continue the war that began on October 7.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A rocket launched by Palestinian militants from Gaza towards Israel activated sirens in the south of the country on Saturday night.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Eleven people have been killed following a Russian strike on Ukraine's partially occupied Donetsk province on Saturday, according to regional authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Five children were among the dead and eight further people were wounded in the attack on Pokrovis district.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Emergency services say the number of victims could increase as around six more people appear to be under the rubble of one of the destroyed buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy warned that Russia will feel the results of every such attack, adding that no such strike will go without consequences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Also on Saturday, Ukraine's military claimed it successfully attacked the Saki military airbase in the west of the Russian-occupied Crimean Peninsula.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the Kharkiv prosecutor said a missile which hit the city on January 2 appears to have been made in North Korea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The U.S. recently claimed that Russia is deploying North Korean missiles in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Orthodox Christians around the world celebrated Christmas, which falls overnight on January 6th to 7th, according to the Julian calendar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Bethlehem in the West Bank, Patriarch Theothilos III of Jerusalem led Midnight mass celebrating Greek Orthodox Christmas at the Church of the Nativity. In Moscow, the Russian Orthodox Church Patriarch Cyril led the Divine Liturgy Service at the Cathedral of Christ the Saviour. Residents in the Ukrainian capital Kyiv celebrated the Feast of Epiphany on the eve of the Orthodox Christmas by diving into the cold Dilipro River. In Belgrade, Serbian believers marked Christmas Eve by burning oak branches at sermons held outside churches and temples.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Thousands of worshippers dived into the wintry waters of rivers and lakes across Bulgaria to retrieve crucifixes cast by priests during Epiphany ceremonies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The US Secretary of State, Antony Blinken, arrived in the Jordanian capital, Amman, on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The top US diplomat is continuing his visit to the Middle East amid growing tensions in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Blinken began his tour by visiting Turkey and Greece, where he addressed the ongoing war in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Jordan is the first Arab nation on Blinken's tour and will be followed by Qatar, the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He will then visit Israel and the West Bank before wrapping up the trip in Egypt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: and the West Bank before wrapping up the trip in Egypt. EU top diplomat Joseph Borrell warned against the conflict in Gaza spilling over into Lebanon

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Speaking from Beirut alongside Lebanese Prime Minister Nayib Mikati, Borrell said it's absolutely necessary to avoid Lebanon being dragged into a regional conflict, adding that already thousands of civilians have been displaced in Lebanon. أعتقد بأنه يمكن تجنب الحرب ويجب أن تجنبها ويجب أن تجنب الحرب solution. It is imperative to avoid regional escalation in the Middle East.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It is absolutely necessary to avoid Lebanon being dragged into a regional conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Borrell's comments came as Lebanon's Hezbollah militia fired dozens of rockets at northern Israel on Saturday, warning that the barrage was its initial response to the targeted killing, presumably by Israel or the top leader from the allied Hamas group.
